name: bewear

abilities.name: fluffy
abilities.description: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.

abilities.name: klutz
abilities.description: The Pokémon can’t use any held items.

abilities.name: unnerve
abilities.description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

description:
This immensely dangerous Pokémon
possesses overwhelming physical strength.
Its habitat is generally off-limits.
